name: Living My Best Life
description:
Living my best life. A game about facing your inner demons




Normal Controls 
left and right arrow keys to move
space to jump

Monster Controls
left, right, up , and down arrow keys to move

Credits

Programming, Player Character Art
- Barret Vasilchik
